column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I'm a big fan of the Malnati Chicago Classic
column2: which has sausage and extra cheese. I've had it with added pepperoni and jalape√±os too. The "Lou" is also fantastic
column3: despite the fact that it contains no meat. It's really a special pie that tastes amazing
column4: so I recommend you try it even if you are a dyed in the wool carnivore like me.
